text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow "Stand For America" is a pretty ironic name for an organization founded by a person who's totally OK with #BunkerBoy's racist, hateful defense of the Confederacy & QAnon, #RussianBounty on our troops, criminal neglect of the COVID-19 crisis, & refusal to take any responsibility. https://t.co/Mqj4w3jdgD
